Determine if charge type has value, so this too 'B12${value and "expense" or ""}': 'budget_method', 'B12${value and value.lower() or ""}': 'charge_type', 'C12': 'income_section_id${value and value [value .find("-")+1:value .find("-")+8] or ""}', 'D12': 'activity_group_id', 'E12${value and value[0:value.find("-")] or ""}': 'cost_control_id', 'F12': 'description', 'G12': 'reason', 'H12': 'unit', 'I12': 'activity_unit_price', 'J12': 'activity_unit', 'K12': 'total_budget', 'L12': 'm0', 'M12': 'next_fy_commitment', 'N12': 'm1', 'O12': 'm2', 'P12': 'm3', 'Q12': 'm4', 'R12': 'm5', 'S12': 'm6', 'T12': 'm7', 'U12': 'm8', 'V12': 'm9', 'W12': 'm10', 'X12': 'm11', 'Y12': 'm12', }, }, 'Revenue': { 'plan_revenue_line_ids[150]': { 'B12${value and "revenue" or ""}': 'budget_method', 'B12${value and value.lower() or ""}': 'charge_type', 'C12': 'activity_group_id', 'D12${value and value[0:value.find("-")] or ""}': 'cost_control_id', 'E12': 'description', 'F12': 'reason', 'G12': 'unit', 'H12': 'activity_unit_price', 'I12': 'activity_unit', 'J12': 'total_budget', 'K12': 'm1', 'L12': 'm2', 'M12': 'm3', 'N12': 'm4', 'O12': 'm5', 'P12': 'm6', 'Q12': 'm7', 'R12': 'm8', 'S12': 'm9', 'T12': 'm10', 'U12': 'm11', 'V12': 'm12', }, }, }, '__POST_IMPORT__': [ '${object.post_import_validation()}', ], }
